node.title: COVID case visited major Gold Coast shopping centre on Black Friday
node.alt: A side shot of a shopping centre with a Christmas tree outside.
node.description: The city is on high alert as Queensland Health confirms a new positive COVID case went to Robina Town Centre last week.
node.content:
["A new positive COVID case has been detected on the Gold Coast, putting people who visited one of the city\u2019s largest shopping centres during last week's Black Friday Sales on high alert.", "People who were at Robina Town Centre on November 26 were contacted by Queensland Health this afternoon and\u00a0notified they could be casual contacts of a case that visited the shopping centre last Friday.", "All of Robina Town Centre, from 1.30pm to 2.45pm on Friday, November 26, was deemed a low-risk\u00a0contact site this afternoon.", "The centre's Target, Rebel Sport and JB HiFi stores have been listed as casual contact sites\u00a0between 1.30pm and 2.30pm on the same day.", "Queensland Health says\u00a0\"an investigation is underway to determine the source of infection\".", "", "
Robina Town Centre on the Gold Coast received a visit from a COVID-positive shopper last week.(Supplied)
", "It is unknown which variant of coronavirus\u00a0the positive case has.\u00a0", "\"The case has visited the Robina Town Centre during the Black Friday shopping sales, so we would urge anyone who has visited the location or has symptoms, no matter how mild, to come forward and get tested,\" a Queensland Health spokesperson said.", "", "
A busy COVID testing clinic in Mudgeeraba on the Gold Coast on December 1, 2021.(ABC News: Steve Keen)
", "Further information is expected about the case\u00a0to be released on Thursday.", "There were long lines at testing centres near the shopping centre, including Mudgeeraba,\u00a0this afternoon.", "Robina Town Centre has been contacted for comment", "", "
Heavily mutated Omicron variant puts scientist on alert
"]
